title: ACA.Capture.Pro.v5.60.CRACKED-ONY
description:
APPLICATION : ACA Capture Pro v5.60 *CRACKED*
	 OS : Win
       TYPE : Util
        WWW : http://www.acasystems.com/en/screencapturepro/
    RELDATE : 24/11/2007
 PROTECTION : Serial
 CRKRELDATE : 07/04/2008

INSTALLATION: Install.
              Copy .exe from crack dir. and overwrite installed one.

       NOTES: 
              you got to love acasystems humour... snippet from aca006.dll

              REP STOS DWORD PTR ES:[EDI]
              MOV EDI,aca006_100253E4                ; ASCII "Don&#039;t crack me!!"
              OR ECX,0FFFFFFFFh

              @aca006_1000230F:
              MOV EDI,aca006_100253C4                ; ASCII "Oh, baby, don&#039;t crack me... :)"
              OR ECX,0FFFFFFFFh

              by taking a shortcut around this boring dll you pretty much solve the whole protection.
              you just need to fix some eyecandy after that, can be done in many ways, nice.
       
              more sparetime killed.. enjoy! / ONY

       ABOUT:

(Formerly: SuperCapture Professional)

ACA Capture Pro is a windows screen capture software, it capture screen images, web pages,
Flash, icon, menu from your Windows PC even those hard-to-grab DirectX, Direct3D games or 
video player, create videos of your computer screen(screen recorder/screencam).
With ACA Capture Pro&#039;s many features, you can supercharge your Print Screen key and save 
time and enhance your screen shots.

With ACA Capture Pro, you can:

* SCREEN CAPTURE

      We perfected windows screen capture and improve it with every release, such as full screen
      (include DirectX game screen), windows, object, ellipse, polygon, rectangle, menu...etc..

* WEB IMAGE CAPTURE

      ACA Capture Pro can capture all images that appear on the web pages.

* WEB PAGE CAPTURE

      ACA Capture Pro can capture a long web page to an image file, even if it scrolls off-screen.

* WEB FLASH CAPTURE

      ACA Capture Procan capture all flash files that appear on the web pages.

* ICON CAPTURE

      You can use this tool to capture any icons whatever from a file, a directory, or whole
      harddisks on your computer.

* VIDEO CAPTURE(SCREEN RECORDING)

      You can capture the action from your Windows screen and saves it as a standard, easily edited,
      AVI (Audio-Video Interleaved) movie file.
